text:
It’s been 10-days since my first dose of the #COVID19 #vaccine. Other than a day of soreness at the injection spot, I have had NO side effects. I’m encouraging my #blackandbrown brothers & sisters to #GetVaccinated as soon as it’s available to you!

@#HBCU #SaveALife #WearAMask https://t.co/yyrmfQqmhm
